reviews.text: have a craving for fish n chip,not much expectation when step in the restaurant. The food was well presented.The first taste omg fish was fresh,although  20 dlrs,compliment with a soup,is really worth it.Outside crispy, fish of much gd quality.Cook well,  chef! white coffee 3.80 nice,orange  juice yummy..Sincere abt their  food.Highly recommend.will revisit.The staff are attentive n the beautiful staff make the whole experience simply awesome ðŸ‘Œ

Food was good enough for some bites along with drinks.
Drinks are decent. The beer has enough foam, which is good enough for a beginner level drinker like me.
Cocktail was nicely presented as well. Flavour is balanced.
The services standard is not always consistent though. Sometimes good. Sometimes the waiter or waitress just couldnâ€™t notice the hands raised at different tables.

Was here for a company event, and the service was so fantastic that I will definitely come back here again on my own. I got the bartenderâ€™s special and had some bites. Amazing service by Evangeline and Ajin who were so nice to us. Super friendly team. Beautiful view and ambience. 10/10!!!!
Great team of girls here. Awesome service and very accommodating to our orders. Amazing alfresco area too. Will come back!

I requested for Eimee to surprise me with something strong and yummy. She created this amazing vodka based bespoke for me. Mushroom pizza was one of the best I ever had as well. Service here was wonderful too! Staff was attentive and friendly
